Qualification

Complete the application for admission undergraduate programme.

Academic Qualification

  • SPM/O LEVEL/EQUIVALENT
  • STPM/A LEVEL/ UEC/EQUIVALENT (IF APPLICABLE)

SPM/O LEVEL/EQUIVALENT:
Ex-TARCians and applicants from other institution of higher learning with SPM/O Level/equivalent results are also required to complete this section.
Please note that maximum 12 subjects will be allowed for spm results.
The only accepted formats are .png, .jpg or .jpeg

Choose Result Format

You must specify what is the display | outline format of subject results. Please note that the selected format might impact the auto data entry for your qualification.

Have a look at examples below.


With Brackets:
  • SEJARAH A- (CEMERLANG)
  • MATHEMATICS A+ (CEMERLANG TERTINGGI)
Without Brackets:
  • SEJARAH A- CEMERLANG
  • MATHEMATICS A+ CEMERLANG TERTINGGI

Loading...





STPM/A LEVEL/ UEC/EQUIVALENT (IF APPLICABLE):
Applicants with UEC and SPM are also to complete the above SPM section.
The only accepted formats are .png, .jpg or .jpeg

Choose Result Format

You must specify what is the display | outline format of subject results. Please note that the selected format might impact the auto data entry for your qualification.

Have a look at examples below.


Accepted Format
  • PENGAJIAN AM B 3.00 (LULUS PENUH)
  • LITERATURE IN ENGLISH A 4.00 (LULUS PENUH)

Loading...
